summary: REQ-1 and REQ-3 appear implemented via dynamic canonical/og:url generation from VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL with origin normalization and an added .env.example. REQ-2 documentation changes are present but the provided diff content is truncated before showing required details (trailing-slash handling and verification steps). REQ-4 backend guidance was updated to mention VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL, but the example value format shown conflicts with the frontend’s “full URL with protocol” requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/DOMAIN_CONFIGURATION.md with explicit step-by-step instructions including accepted formats, trailing slash handling, and verification steps in browser.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for frontend/DOMAIN_CONFIGURATION.md is truncated mid-section and does not show trailing-slash handling guidance or browser/devtools verification steps, so the acceptance criteria cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Align backend deployment guidance comments in backend/main.mo with the frontend domain configuration approach (reference VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL with accurate, concrete instructions; no misleading placeholders).
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo references VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL but provides an example value without protocol ("app.yourdomain.com"), which conflicts with the frontend requirement/documentation that the variable be a full URL with protocol (e.g., https://example.com).
evidence: frontend/DOMAIN_CONFIGURATION.md (states format: full URL with protocol)

hallucinated_features.description: Significant UI/marketing/animation/style enhancements (Header/Hero/Services/About/Footer components, new animations, Tailwind config extensions, new images/copy changes) unrelated to domain/origin configuration.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals explicitly exclude adding new product features unrelated to domain/origin configuration; these changes appear unrelated based on the diff summary list.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, frontend/src/App.tsx, frontend/src/components/marketing/*, frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts, frontend/src/components/marketing/SectionReveal.tsx)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project tracking metadata in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; BuildRequest focuses on domain configuration, docs, and backend comment alignment.

hallucinated_features.description: Added frontend/src/config/siteUrl.ts helper module (beyond canonical/og:url behavior in index.html).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not explicitly requested; REQ-1 only requires canonical/og:url be controlled by VITE_PUBLIC_SITE_URL with fallback behavior. This helper may be useful but is additional scope beyond stated requirements.
